name: Footprints Festival

config_properties.name: Footprints Festival
config_properties.description: A curated discovery festival at TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, showcasing emerging international artists across diverse genres.

ai_profile:
**Footprints Festival 2026: A Celebration of Diversity and Innovation**  

The Footprints Festival 2026 is a vibrant showcase of musical diversity, bringing together 11 artists from 10 countries across the globe. From Germany to Brazil, Nigeria to Iran, this year’s lineup reflects a rich tapestry of cultural influences. With seven artists identifying as people of color and a mix of female, male, and mixed-gender acts, the festival continues its commitment to inclusivity and representation on the global stage.  

Musically, Footprints 2026 spans an eclectic range of genres, from Electronic and Psychedelic sounds to Anatolian Rock, Malian Desert Blues, and Jazz. The lineup is a bold fusion of tradition and innovation, with genres like Traditional Iranian, Afrobeat, and Armenian Folk standing alongside modern styles like Minimalist Electropop and 80s-inspired grooves. This unique blend of sounds ensures there’s something for every music lover, creating a space where global traditions and experimental creativity meet.  

With an impressive average rating of 7.73 and Spotify links available for all acts, festival-goers are in for an unforgettable experience. The lineup highlights not only the common ground of artistic excellence but also the differences that make each act stand out. Footprints Festival 2026 is more than a music event—it’s a celebration of connection, culture, and the power of music to bring people together.
